article_title: Insurers' Demand For A 'Halbig' Contingency Plan Demonstrates Need For Immediate SCOTUS Review

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The parties who have the most money riding on the outcome of these cases have shown that they rely heavily on the challenged subsidies, and that they believe there is a reasonable chance the plaintiffs will prevail in court.
